00059 typedef enum {
00060     ACTION_NOTHING,
00061     ACTION_WARNING,
00062     ACTION_SUSPEND,
00063     ACTION_HIBERNATE,
00064     ACTION_SHUTDOWN,
00065     ACTION_UNKNOWN,
